txt.en: Find and speak with the scout
'Though the farm is lost now, through your efforts the land may be reclaimed. Let us return and tell the others of this victory.'

A farm on the outskirts of the South Downs is occupied by goblins. The farmer and his kin have asked for assistance in seeking vengeance against the goblin menace there. Our reports discovered that a particularly powerful goblin now leads the interlopers. Find it and dispatch the creature with haste.
